rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one back on top and the rest into your graveyard.
{3}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token with all abilities of that card, then create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is that card's mana value.
